sn24.37:1.2: “Kismim nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kim upadaya, kim abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.37:2.1: “Rupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rupam upadaya, rupam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.37:2.6: vinnane sati, vinnanam upadaya, vinnanam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.37:3.1: Tam kim mannatha, bhikkhave, rupam niccam va aniccam va”ti?
sn24.37:3.3: viparinamadhammam, api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn24.37:3.6: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkham upadaya, dukkham abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
